description.zh-cn: 中国前最高领导人胡锦涛与刘永清的女儿，商人茅道临的妻子。毕业于清华大学和中欧国际工商学院。
description.en: The daughter of former paramount leader of China Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing, and the wife of businessman Mao Daolin. She is an alumna of Tsinghua University and China Europe International Business School.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who held the titles of General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的妻子，胡海峰与胡海清的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Hu Jintao, and mother of Hu Haifeng and Hu Haiqing.

description.zh-cn: 商人，胡海清的丈夫，曾任新浪网首席执行官。
description.en: Businessman, husband of Hu Haiqing, and former CEO of SINA Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，胡锦涛与刘永清之子，现任中华人民共和国民政部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, son of Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing, currently serving as the Vice Minister of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任黑龙江省省长、中华人民共和国国土资源部部长。后因腐败问题被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Governor of Heilongjiang and Minister of Land and Resources of the People's Republic of China. He was later investigated for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 前哈尔滨医科大学校长，曾向中央举报胡海清承包哈尔滨医科大学附属医院一事。
description.en: Former president of Harbin Medical University who reported Hu Haiqing's attempt to contract the university's affiliated hospital to the central authorities.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪委书记。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所公立大学，被认为是中国最著名的大学之一。
description.en: A public university in Beijing, China, widely regarded as one of the most prestigious universities in the country.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海的一所商学院。
description.en: A business school located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 一家由清华大学控股的高科技公司。
description.en: A high-tech company controlled by Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 中国一家网络公司。
description.en: A Chinese online media company.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的主要负责人，也是中国共产党的最高领导人。
description.en: The head of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party and the highest-ranking official within the CCP.

en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal control institution of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会书记

en: Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 哈尔滨医科大学附属医院承包事件

zh-cn: 哈尔滨医科大学附属医院承包事件

description.zh-cn: 指胡海清在茅道临和田凤山等人协助下，试图承包哈尔滨医科大学附属医院，但因其父胡锦涛干预而最终失败的事件。
description.en: An event in which Hu Haiqing, with the assistance of Mao Daolin and Tian Fengshan, attempted to contract the Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University, but ultimately failed due to the intervention of her father, Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省旧县名，现属泰州市。
description.en: A former county in Jiangsu province, China, now part of Taizhou city.

description.zh-cn: 胡海清与茅道临于2003年3月在夏威夷举行婚礼。
description.en: Hu Haiqing and Mao Daolin held their wedding in Hawaii in March 2003.

description.zh-cn: 1988年至1993年就读于清华大学热能工程系空调专业。
description.en: Studied in the Air Conditioning major of the Department of Thermal Engineering at Tsinghua University from 1988 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 从清华大学毕业后，胡海清到清华同方工作。
description.en: After graduating from Tsinghua University, Hu Haiqing worked at Tsinghua Tongfang.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛曾坚决反对女儿胡海清出国留学，并在其擅自前往比利时后，勒令其回国。
description.en: Hu Jintao strongly opposed his daughter Hu Haiqing's plan to study abroad and ordered her to return to China after she went to Belgium without his permission.

description.zh-cn: 移居美国后，胡海清与丈夫茅道临拒绝了父亲胡锦涛多次要求他们回国的请求。
description.en: After moving to the United States, Hu Haiqing and her husband Mao Daolin refused her father Hu Jintao's repeated requests for them to return to China.

description.zh-cn: 移居美国后，茅道临与妻子胡海清拒绝了岳父胡锦涛多次要求他们回国的请求。
description.en: After moving to the United States, Mao Daolin and his wife Hu Haiqing refused his father-in-law Hu Jintao's repeated requests for them to return to China.

relationships.target: 哈尔滨医科大学附属医院承包事件

description.zh-cn: 茅道临为胡海清指引承包哈尔滨医科大学附属医院，并提供1亿人民币资金。
description.en: Mao Daolin guided Hu Haiqing to contract the Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University and provided 100 million RMB in funding.

relationships.target: 哈尔滨医科大学附属医院承包事件

description.zh-cn: 时任黑龙江省省长田凤山向哈尔滨医科大学施压，并为胡海清联系国有银行贷款5亿人民币。
description.en: Tian Fengshan, then governor of Heilongjiang Province, pressured Harbin Medical University and arranged a 500 million RMB loan from state-owned banks for Hu Haiqing.

relationships.target: 哈尔滨医科大学附属医院承包事件

description.zh-cn: 前哈医大校长金铮认为承包事件对胡锦涛影响不好，通过尉健行将此事转告胡锦涛，最终导致计划中断。
description.en: Jin Zheng, former president of Harbin Medical University, believed the contract would negatively affect Hu Jintao and reported the matter to him via Wei Jianxing, leading to the plan's termination.

relationships.target: 哈尔滨医科大学附属医院承包事件

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛得知此事后，勒令女儿胡海清退出，导致医院承包计划中断。
description.en: After learning about the matter, Hu Jintao ordered his daughter Hu Haiqing to withdraw, causing the hospital contract plan to be terminated.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
中华人民共和国民政部
中华人民共和国国土资源部
中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会书记

relationships.source: 哈尔滨医科大学附属医院
中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 田凤山于2003年10月被双规。
description.en: Tian Fengshan was subjected to 'Shuanggui' in October 2003.

description.zh-cn: 为阻止医院承包事件，前哈医大校长金铮找到时任中央纪委书记尉健行反映情况。
description.en: To stop the hospital contracting event, former Harbin Medical University president Jin Zheng approached Wei Jianxing, then Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, to report the situation.

description.zh-cn: 尉健行将金铮反映的关于胡海清承包医院一事转告了胡锦涛。
description.en: Wei Jianxing relayed the information from Jin Zheng about Hu Haiqing's contracting of the hospital to Hu Jintao.
